title: movocoin
author: movocoin
created_time: August 18, 2022, 08:15:24 AMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 08:42:31 AM by movocoin
content: AlphaLabz is giving away 1000 $ALPHA to every participant who posts the following text on their Twitter account. "Don't miss out on the Airdrop, claim 1000 $ALPHA on https://alphalabzswap.me/ "The tokens can be claimed to your wallet on https://alphalabzswap.me/TeamAll the team is internally doxxed.We have completed an audit on the token We have completed an internal KYC We have verified our contract CONTRACT ADDRESS: 0x8f1D278C438242653Ee0bdd9DbD5A7f29CD046bFWHAT ISAlpha Labz ?Alpha Labz is the protocol that drives innovation not only for crypto users, but web3 content creators. Alpha Labz offers solutions in a variety of fields mainly focused for content creators. Our list of unique products are what drive us to the top. Aiming to be the leader, Alpha Labz also has tools for existing crypto projects to help them succeed. Some of the features that we offer are:*POST TO EARN app - Allows anyone that is interested in growing their social media presence the ability to give their followers rewards for promoting. A white label solution is available for any and all others interested in using.*ALPHA STAKING - A Staking platform that allows $ALPHA holders to stake their tokens to earn more, as well as a platform for partner projects to offer staking pools of their own..*ALPHA X - Decentralized Exchange aggregator that allows for reduced fees for $ALPHA holders, as well as project partners. Built in referral system to allow users to earn rewards as they refer other users to the DEX.*ALPHA ACADEMY - Community group that has general crypto discussion, trading classes, and general partnership portal.*$ALPHA - The native token of the Alpha Labz Protocol. Alpha is used within the reward system as well as trading and stakingWhat isPost To EarnThe concept is simple: You chose what company / project you would like to promote on sites where there is a chance videos will receive viral exposure- for example TikTok, Youtube Shorts, Instagram Reels. That company will provide a pool and an amount of posts that they want, + conditions of the posts. Follow those conditions and use the media provided to post across social media and now you can input the links into the app and be paid out! It’s really as simple as that.So why can I make so much money doing this? Because it’s a new concept. It’s possible as the application blows up, the reward pools will become tactics however right now Tiktok, Reels and Shorts are THE MOST EFFECTIVE marketing a company can do especially when targeting young adults. Projects, especially in crypto are willing to allocate a lot of money towards these posting pools so there will always be opportunities to make financial gains.
